events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the Software Engineer position, highlighting extensive experience in full-stack development and cloud technologies.
The recruitment system categorized the application under the Engineering cluster due to the emphasis on software development skills.
A dedicated recruiter specializing in engineering roles was assigned to the candidate to ensure a smooth and targeted recruitment process.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call to verify the candidate's skills and motivations for the Software Engineer role.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm for the next steps in the interview process.
The technical interview was scheduled for the candidate, focusing on coding skills, system design, and DevOps knowledge.
